title: Nicola Roberts Announces Pregnancy Amid Career Milestones
summary: Nicola Roberts, a member of the pop band Girls Aloud, has publicly announced her pregnancy with her first child at age 40. In a social media post on Instagram, she revealed she is five months pregnant and expects to give birth in spring, sharing a photo of herself cradling her baby bump in front of a Christmas tree. She expressed excitement with her partner, footballer Mitch Hahn, noting they shared the news with their families on Christmas Day after keeping it secret. The announcement garnered congratulations from fellow celebrities, including bandmate Kimberley Walsh and Little Mix singer Perrie Edwards. This news comes as Roberts continues her role in the West End musical Hadestown, where she plays Persephone, with her run ending in January. Additionally, Girls Aloud recently reunited for a tour in 2023, dedicating it to late bandmate Sarah Harding, and 2024 marks 21 years since the band formed after winning Popstars: The Rivals. Roberts has pursued solo music and acting, highlighting her multifaceted career in entertainment.

Roberts has also built a solo career in music and theatre, including roles in West End productions.
